name: Burikinia
startIntroPart1: Salutations to you, President Anto Kertajaya. The nation of Burikinia has entrusted you to guide its fate upon your hands. This nation, born from the ashes of liberation, is at the forefront of technological innovation. While Burikinia may be a peace-loving country, its strength should not be underestimated.
startIntroPart2: Anto Kertajaya, are you up to the task of bringing Burikinia to its glory? We shall find out.
declaringWar: Your nation is filth upon this world. Cease to exist, or Prepare for war.
attacked: War? Do you think your nation is mighty enough to challenge a dragon?
defeated: Mark my words. Our nation shall rise again, and soon it shall eclipse everything you've ever done.
introduction: Greetings. I am Anto Kertajaya, President of Burikinia. May our nations prosper together.
hateLetsHearIt: Hurry up, I don't have all day.
hateNo: Are you making fun of us?
afterPeace: Oh, now you want peace? Very well.
tradeRequest: We would like to offer you a trade request..
